transcript: most of the pain that people experience is purely in their own minds they don't know how to reframe reality what it really is is they got a comment on a post that bugged them is this comment bigger than my future it's embarrassing to even have to say that but when you say it then you admit it and all of a sudden you put it in the light and the shame kind of starts to evaporate one of the things that has helped me was saying like what's true about this and the next one is like what if we confront it and say like what if they're right and yeah I'm still going to do it anyways
